text: Jaba timi dharmayud'dhama praptahune malala'i prapta garnako nimti uniharutira hindnechau ta yi pachi parneharule tatkala bhannechan ki ‘‘hamila'i pani aphno satha jana anumati dinus’’ uniharule cahanchan ki allahako kathanala'i parivartita garidi'un. Bhanidinus ki timi kahilyai pani hamro sathama hindna sakdainau. Allahale aghinai yasto bhanidi'eko cha. Ani bhannechan (ho'ina) timi ta hamisita isrya gardachaum. Kuro yo cha ki tiniharule bahutai kama bujhchan
